articles.title: Gotabaya Rajapaksa Applies For Green Card To Settle In US: Report - NDTV
articles.description: Former Sri Lankan President Gotabaya Rajapaksa, who fled the country last month amidst massive anti-government protests calling for his resignation, is awaiting to obtain a US Green Card to return to America.
articles.content:
The 73-year-old Gotabaya Rajapaksa is presently in a hotel in Bangkok along with his wife

articles.title: SEVENTEEN’s Dino to not take part in upcoming tour stops after testing positive for COVID-19 - PINKVILLA
